DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine percentage English- Spanish-speaking smoker worldwide stop smoking use Internet stop smoking site . Latinos non-Latinos welcome participate . We stop recruitment March 19 , 2011 . Participants able use site May 19 , 2011 .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Stop Smoking Study - Phase VI
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase VI series clinical trial compare various Internet method help smoker quit via Internet . Our previous trial involve randomized assignment . This trial participant preference trial , English- Spanish-speaking smoker able choose element site would like use stop smoking . Smokers find link via search engine list Web site may choose enter study . Participants must 18 year old enter study . Participants follow 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month entry study determine whether stopped smoke . They receive email reminder link follow-up survey . We stop send email reminder May 19 , 2011 , current Website close . Participation totally voluntary . Participants free provide data stop participating time .
DOC.criteria: Adult ( 18 year old ) must email log stop smoking Internet site provide consent enter stop smoking study Younger 18 year old
